description: Make Misskey more fun, and more useful. All-in-one tools for the all misskists.
name: Name
sendAlertDescription: Send your alert with current settings to test.
sendAlertDisabled: You cannot test sending alert because the "How to Send Alerts" setting is "Do Nothing".
logoutDescription: If you log out, your alerts will be sent automatically.
deleteAccountDescription: Delete your Misskey Tools account. This will deactivate integration with Misskey.
isCalculating: It is being calculated now. Please check back later!
translatedByTheCommunity: Misskey Tools is translated by volunteers.
developedAsOpenSourceSoftware: Misskey Tools is open source software, so everyone can contribute to the development. Would you like to do so?
shouldUpdateToken: Please update your authentication token, or some functions will not work properly.
cwOption: 内容に対する注釈（オプション）
noMoreInput: これ以上入力できません

_welcome.misskeholicAlertDescription: Misskeyにのめり込んでいませんか？ミス廃アラートを使えば、毎日のMisskeyでの活動量を定期投稿できます。
_welcome.misskeholicRankingDescription: ミス廃ランキングでは、Misskeyでの活動を数値化し、ランキング表示します。
_welcome.avatarCropperDescription: Cut through icons at will with previewing round, square, and cat-eared states. Make your avatar more attractive.
_welcome.questionBoxDescription: Let's create a page to accept questions anonymously. You can answer the questions you receive with your Misskey account.
_welcome.followingManagerDescription: Manage an overgrowing number of following and followers. You can filter accounts by your conditions such as the host name, or whether not be followed back. It also supports batch processing.
_welcome.nextFeaturesDescription: This is not all. We will add more tools by updates in the future.
_welcome.myPageDescription: Let's create your own page with links of your Misskey accounts, introduction, opened question box, and so on! Your page is fully customizable and can share URL!

_misshaiAlert.holicRankingDescription: ユーザーの「ミス廃レート」を算出し、高い順にランキング表示しています。
_misshaiAlert.useRanking: ランキングに参加する
_misshaiAlert.note: 自動的にノートとして投稿する
_misshaiAlert.notificationWarning: Misskeyのバージョンによっては動作しません。

_noteScheduler.noNotes: 予約投稿はまだ作成されていません。
_noteScheduler.deleteConfirm: 本当に予約投稿「{{note}}」を削除しますか？

_template.hashtagAutomaticInsertion: ハッシュタグ #missholicalert は、テンプレートに関わらず自動付与されます。
_template.default:
My Misskey activity yesterday was:

Notes: {notesCount}({notesDelta})
Following: {followingCount}({followingDelta})
Followers: {followersCount}({followersDelta})

{url}
_template.insertVariablesHelp: The string enclosed in { } is called "variables" and has a special meaning. If you include this, it will be automatically replaced to the actual value when alerts created.

_error.sorry: Something went wrong. Please retry again.
_error.hostNotFound: Could not connect to the instance. Make sure that the host name is correct and the instance is live.

_sendTest.title: Are you sure you want to test the alert?
_sendTest.message: Send an alert with the current settings. Be sure to check that the settings have been saved before sending.

_logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?
_logout.message: Even if you log out, features such as sending alerts and collecting data from your Misskey account will continue to work. If you wish to stop using Misskey Tools, click the "Deactivate account integration" button.

_deactivate.title: Do you want to deactivate your accounts?
_deactivate.message: All data, including collected data and personal settings, will be deleted. You cannot undo this operation. You cannot undo this operation.
_deactivate.success: Your account has been deactivated. Return to the top screen.
